page.title: 17FOUR MARKS POETRY:WINTERTIME
page.content: WINTER TIME It is five o'clock Already it is dark We've got a nice warm fire Outside you can see our snowman with its scarf and hat on. The car all frozen up The trees with the snow on the branches The birds searching for food The icicles hanging from the garage Now its dinner we have got hot toast with butter oozing out. Afterwards I will probably sit in front of the fire and play a game. In the morning I will most likely ask one of my friends to play. Then go out on our sledges and have snowball fights. Then we will go skating on the pond. I think its going to be great fun tomorrow!
